item.title: Display, Buttons & LED
item.description: Display There are 2 types of OLED displays that can be used for this project, the SSD1306 and the SH1106: And they sometimes come with either I2C or SPI: Now for the display it is very important that you know which connection it is using. I2C can be connected to any GPIO pin (except 16). The SPI however requires following connections: Display GPIO SCL/CLK/SCK GPIO 14 (D5) SDA/MOSI GPIO 13 (D7) RST, DC and CS pins can connected to any pin.
